languages.text: "Время и правда безжалостно к скудной памяти плебсов". {n}Кассия утомленно вздыхает и чуть закатывает глаза.{/n} "Согласно трудам архивариуса Заккария Фейна-третьего, Себастьян Винтерскейл первым открыл сей мир для подданных Империума. А полвека спустя на поверхность планеты опустился ковчег, имя которому — Кетца Темер".

traits.locale_text: "Время и правда безжалостно к скудной памяти плебсов". {n}Кассия утомленно вздыхает и чуть закатывает глаза.{/n} "Согласно трудам архивариуса Заккария Фейна-третьего, Себастьян Винтерскейл первым открыл сей мир для подданных Империума. А полвека спустя на поверхность планеты опустился ковчег, имя которому — Кетца-аль Хет".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "The flow of time is truly merciless to the meagre memory of peasants." {n}Cassia lets out a weary sigh and slightly rolls her eyes.{/n} "According to the works of the archivist Zacchary Fein III, Sebastian Winterscale was the first to discover this world for the Imperium's subjects. And half a century after, an ark descended to the planet's surface — the Quetza Temer."
languages.original_text: "Время и правда безжалостно к скудной памяти плебсов". {n}Кассия утомленно вздыхает и чуть закатывает глаза.{/n} "Согласно трудам архивариуса Заккария Фейна-третьего, Себастьян Винтерскейл первым открыл сей мир для подданных Империума. А полвека спустя на поверхность планеты опустился ковчег, имя которому — Кетца Темер".

traits.locale_text: "The flow of time is truly merciless to the meagre memory of the plebs." {n}Cassia lets out a weary sigh and slightly rolls her eyes.{/n} "According to the archivist Zaccary Fein the Third's memoir, Sebastian Winterscale was the first to discover this world for the Imperium' subjects. And half a century after, an ark had descended upon this planet's surface — Quetza Temer."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The flow of time is truly merciless to the meagre memory of the plebs." {n}Cassia lets out a weary sigh and slightly rolls her eyes.{/n} "According to the archivist Zaccary Fein the Third's memoir, Sebastian Winterscale was the first to discover this world for the Imperium' subjects. And half a century after, an ark had descended upon this planet's surface — Quetza Temer."

And half a century after, an ark had descended upon this planet's surface — Quetza Temer."

And half a century after, an ark had descended upon this planet's surface — Quetza Temer."

traits.locale_text: "The flow of time is truly merciless to the meagre memory of peasants." {n}Cassia lets out a weary sigh and slightly rolls her eyes.{/n} "According to the works of the archivist Zacchary Fein III, Sebastian Winterscale was the first to discover this world for the Imperium's subjects. And half a century after, an ark descended to the planet's surface — the Quetza Temer."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The flow of time is truly merciless to the meagre memory of peasants." {n}Cassia lets out a weary sigh and slightly rolls her eyes.{/n} "According to the works of the archivist Zacchary Fein III, Sebastian Winterscale was the first to discover this world for the Imperium's subjects. And half a century after, an ark descended to the planet's surface — the Quetza Temer."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «El paso del tiempo es verdaderamente implacable con la exigua memoria de los plebeyos». {n}Cassia suspira profundamente y pone los ojos en blanco.{/n} «Según las memorias del archivista Zaccary Fein III, Sebastian Winterscale descubrió este mundo para los súbditos del Imperium. Y medio siglo después, un arca se posó en la superficie del planeta. Se llamaba Quetza Temer».
languages.original_text: "The flow of time is truly merciless to the meagre memory of peasants." {n}Cassia lets out a weary sigh and slightly rolls her eyes.{/n} "According to the works of the archivist Zacchary Fein III, Sebastian Winterscale was the first to discover this world for the Imperium's subjects. And half a century after, an ark descended to the planet's surface — the Quetza Temer."

traits.locale_text: «El paso del tiempo es verdaderamente implacable con la exigua memoria de los plebeyos». {n}Cassia suspira profundamente y pone los ojos en blanco.{/n} «Según las memorias del archivista Zaccary Fein Tercero, Sebastian Winterscale descubrió este mundo para los súbditos del Imperium. Y medio siglo después, un arca se posó en la superficie del planeta. Se llamaba Quetza Temer».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “时间的冲刷真是毫不留情，那些农奴已经回忆不起历史的真相。”{n}卡西娅发出了疲惫的叹息，轻轻揉了揉眼睛。{/n}“根据档案员扎卡里·费恩三世的回忆录记载，塞巴斯蒂安·温特斯凯尔才是首位发现这个世界的帝国臣民。半个世纪后，一艘方舟降落在这个行星的表面，那艘船的名字正是格扎尔特默号。”
languages.original_text: "The flow of time is truly merciless to the meagre memory of peasants." {n}Cassia lets out a weary sigh and slightly rolls her eyes.{/n} "According to the works of the archivist Zacchary Fein III, Sebastian Winterscale was the first to discover this world for the Imperium's subjects. And half a century after, an ark descended to the planet's surface — the Quetza Temer."

traits.locale_text: “时间的冲刷真是毫不留情，普通人已经回忆不起历史的真相。”{n}卡西娅发出了疲惫的叹息，轻轻揉了揉眼睛。{/n}“根据档案员扎卡里·费恩三世的回忆录记载，塞巴斯蒂安·温特斯凯尔才是首位发现这个世界的帝国臣民。半个世纪后，一艘方舟降落在这个行星的表面，那艘船的名字正是格扎尔特默号。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia pousse un soupir de lassitude et lève les yeux au ciel.{/n} « Le temps est réellement impitoyable envers la mémoire de la populace. D'après les écrits de l'archiviste Zacchary Fein III, Sebastian Winterscale fut le premier à découvrir ce monde au nom de l'Imperium. Un demi-siècle plus tard, une arche a atterri sur cette planète ; elle portait le nom de Quetza Temer. »
languages.original_text: "The flow of time is truly merciless to the meagre memory of peasants." {n}Cassia lets out a weary sigh and slightly rolls her eyes.{/n} "According to the works of the archivist Zacchary Fein III, Sebastian Winterscale was the first to discover this world for the Imperium's subjects. And half a century after, an ark descended to the planet's surface — the Quetza Temer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia pousse un soupir de lassitude et lève les yeux au ciel.{/n} « Le temps est réellement impitoyable envers la mémoire du petit peuple. D'après les écrits de l'archiviste Zaccary Fein III, Sebastian Winterscale fut le premier à découvrir ce monde au nom de l'Imperium. Un demi-siècle plus tard, une arche a atterri sur cette planète ; elle portait le nom de Quetza Temer. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「時の流れは、農民のちっぽけな記憶にも実に容赦がないものよ」{n}カシアは疲れたようにため息をつき、少し目を丸くした。{/n}「アーキビスト、ザッカリー・フェイン3世の手記によれば、セバスチャン・ウィンタースケールは帝国の臣民のためにこの世界を最初に発見した人物よ。そして半世紀後、箱舟がこの惑星…ケツァ・テメルの地表に降り立った」
languages.original_text: "The flow of time is truly merciless to the meagre memory of peasants." {n}Cassia lets out a weary sigh and slightly rolls her eyes.{/n} "According to the works of the archivist Zacchary Fein III, Sebastian Winterscale was the first to discover this world for the Imperium's subjects. And half a century after, an ark descended to the planet's surface — the Quetza Temer."

traits.locale_text: 「時の流れは、農民のちっぽけな記憶にも実に容赦がないものよ」{n}カシアは疲れたようにため息をつき、少し目を丸くした。{/n}「アーキビスト、ザッカリー・フェイン3世の手記によれば、セバスチャン・ウィンタースケールは帝国の臣民のためにこの世界を最初に発見した人物よ。そして半世紀後、箱舟がこの惑星…ケツァ・テメルの地表に降り立った」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Der Fluss der Zeit springt gnadenlos mit dem schwachen Gedächtnis des Pöbels um." {n}Cassia stößt ein erschöpftes Seufzen aus und verdreht leicht die Augen.{/n} "Laut den Memoiren des Archivisten Zacchary Fein III. hat Sebastian Winterzunder diese Welt für die Untertanen des Imperiums entdeckt. Und ein halbes Jahrhundert später ist eine Arche auf die Oberfläche des Planeten herabgesunken — Quetza Temer."
languages.original_text: "The flow of time is truly merciless to the meagre memory of peasants." {n}Cassia lets out a weary sigh and slightly rolls her eyes.{/n} "According to the works of the archivist Zacchary Fein III, Sebastian Winterscale was the first to discover this world for the Imperium's subjects. And half a century after, an ark descended to the planet's surface — the Quetza Temer."

traits.locale_text: "Der Fluss der Zeit springt gnadenlos mit dem schwachen Gedächtnis des Pöbels um." {n}Cassia stößt ein erschöpftes Seufzen aus und verdreht leicht die Augen.{/n} "Laut den Memoiren des Archivisten Zaccary Fein III. hat Sebastian Winterzunder diese Welt für die Untertanen des Imperiums entdeckt. Und ein halbes Jahrhundert später ist eine Arche auf die Oberfläche des Planeten herabgesunken — Quetza Temer."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Zamanın akışı, köylülerin kıt hafızalarına karşı hakikaten de merhamet bilmiyor." {n}Cassia, bitkin bir şekilde iç çekerek gözlerini hafifçe deviriyor.{/n} "Arşivci III. Zacchary Fein'in çalışmalarına göre Sebastian Winterscale, İmparatorluk tebaası adına bu dünyayı ilk keşfeden kişiymiş. Bir asır sonraysa gezegenin yüzeyine Quetza Temer adında bir ark inmiş."
languages.original_text: "The flow of time is truly merciless to the meagre memory of peasants." {n}Cassia lets out a weary sigh and slightly rolls her eyes.{/n} "According to the works of the archivist Zacchary Fein III, Sebastian Winterscale was the first to discover this world for the Imperium's subjects. And half a century after, an ark descended to the planet's surface — the Quetza Temer."
